message: Take it or leave it, Bob! 60-40 split is fair.
You're going to regret rejecting my 60-40 offer! Now I'm offering 70-30
Meet me in the middle, Bob! 55-45 split is a fair compromise.
You're being too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go any further
It's time to be fair, Bob. 50-50 split is the only way to go.
